explains: adj. 自制的，家里做的；国产的

sentences.en: She had homemade ice cream for dessert.
sentences.cn: 她吃了些自制冰淇淋当餐后甜点。

sentences.en: In 2013, China's first homemade aircraft was completed.
sentences.cn: 2013年，中国第一架国产飞机完成。

sentences.en: On a chain-link fence along Route 39 hangs a homemade poster, peppered with hearts, thanking firefighters and police.
sentences.cn: 39号公路沿线的铁丝网上挂着一张人们自制的海报，上面布满了心形图案，以感谢消防员和警察。
